name: search_gifs
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool humor_jokes_and_memes.
Tool description: Humor API lets you search through 50,000 jokes, over 200,000 memes, and gifs. From Chuck Norris, over Knock Knock to Yo Mama jokes, you'll find something for every occasion.
API description: Search for gifs.
See https://humorapi.com/docs/#Search-Gifs for more.

query.description: The search query to find matching gifs.

number.description: The number of results to retrieve, between 1 and 10. Defaults to 3.
